scripts.install: mkdir -p dockervolume && (cd backend && cp example.env .env) && (cd dockerdb && docker build -t database .) && (docker run  --name databaseforlocal -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 -v $(pwd)/dockervolume:/var/lib/mysql -d database mysqld --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password) && (cd backend && npm install) && (cd frontend && npm install)
scripts.start:local: npm run start-database & npm run start-backend & npm run start-frontend
scripts.start-database: docker stop $(docker ps -q) && docker start databaseforlocal
scripts.seed:localdb: (cd dockerdb/sql && cat 02-seed.sql | docker exec -i databaseforlocal /usr/bin/mysql -u root --password=123456 resourceplanner)
scripts.start:docker: cp example.env .env && mkdir -p dockervolume && docker-compose up
scripts.seed:db: (cd dockerdb/sql && cat 02-seed.sql | docker exec -i database /usr/bin/mysql -u root --password=123456 resourceplanner)
scripts.start:testdb: docker stop $(docker ps -q) && docker run --rm  --name databasefortest -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 -v $(pwd)/dockerdb/sql/1-create.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/1-create.sql -d database mysqld --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password
